EmailTemplate.name: 181112 The Conference Board Invitation with Complimentary Pass
EmailTemplate.subject: Be Our Guest at The Conference Board’s 2019 Employee Health Care Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We'd like to offer you a complimentary pass to attend The Conference Board's 2019 Employee Health Care Conference being held March 19-20 in San Diego or April 4-5 in New York.
Join industry leaders and your peers to learn about purpose-driven health care strategies and tactics that propel positive business outcomes and enhance the employee experience.
Your complimentary registration, valued at $2,895, also includes the pre-conference workshop: The Journey to Something Better – The Life Cycle of Benefits Delivered Through Great Experiences, running 1 – 5 pm, March 18 in San Diego and April 3 in New York.
If you'd like to be our guest and take advantage of this complimentary pass, please
1. let me know what city you’d like to travel to
2. let me know if you’d also like to attend the pre-conference workshop
3. include your contact details referenced below.
a. Name
b. Title
c. Company
d. Mailing Address (HQ is fine)
e. Phone
f. Email
We will have you registered through The Conference Board and you will receive a confirmation directly from their customer service team.
Best,
[Rep Signature]
